entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Rain mixed with snow overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
